articles.description: Pegylated Interferon Alpha-2b used for treating Hepatitis B and C has been tried on COVID-19 patients in China and Cuba and is a part of the treatment guidelines of the Chinese government.
articles.content: New Delhi: The country's top drug regulator, Drug Controller General of India (DCGI), has received an application from Zydus Cadila, the leading global pharmaceutical company in India, to conduct clinical trial using antiviral drug 'Pegylated Interferon Alpha… [+2312 chars]

articles.title: WHO on 'powerful' vaccine unity, US virus claims - Associated Press
articles.description: The World Health Organization talks about vaccine to battle COVID-19 and US claims that the virus began in a laboratory in the Chinese city of Wuhan. (May 4)...

articles.content: A global alliance of countries are working together with the pharmaceutical industry to find a vaccine against the novel coronavirus SARS-CoV2. More than a hundred candidates are in development. But other nations think the market might be faster - the US is r… [+566 chars]
